sentences.english: At the same time, the provincial hospital entrance examination each of the sites will send inspectors.

sentences.english: China and India were the largest markets for both enrolments and commencements in all sectors.

definition: to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam/to admit (a student)/to hire (a job candidate)
to enter a school or college/to go to school for the first time as a child
to advertise an entrance examination for an academic institution (old)
to enter oneself for an examination
to enter the next grade school
run by the local people/privately operated
